meta.planModeInstructions: Use /plan or EnterPlanMode for detailed implementation planning of any feature

implementationApproach.philosophy: Each feature is an EXPERIMENT with measurable outcomes

structure.goal: Clearly defined in terms of KPIs to move
structure.baseline: Current state of KPIs before experiment
structure.target: Target state of KPIs after experiment

workflow: 5. Track progress in ClickUp, sync status here

capabilities: Create tasks and projects from Claude

syncApproach.statusSync: ClickUp status syncs to backlog.json status
syncApproach.kpiTracking: KPIs linked between feature and MIS dashboard

misIntegration.description: All experiment KPIs flow into Marketing MIS (F011)

features.name: Google Ads BoFU Campaigns
features.description: Setup, performance review, and calibration of bottom-of-funnel Google Ads campaigns targeting high-intent keywords
scope: Campaign structure design (competitor, category, solution keywords)
Ad copy creation aligned with positioning
features.notes: Need Google Ads API/MCP for automation. Currently have HubSpot MCP installed.

features.name: Demand Capture & Multi-Channel Attribution
features.description: Website visitor tracking, identification, and multi-channel attribution across all campaigns
scope: Cross-campaign attribution (Google Ads, LinkedIn, Podcast, etc.)
Outreach triggers based on visitor behavior
features.notes: Core infrastructure for understanding 'What campaigns does a prospect engage with before converting?'

features.name: LinkedIn Demand Generation
features.description: Regular posting of high-quality content for organic LinkedIn demand generation
features.notes: Should align with Full Funnel ABM methodology - LinkedIn-first warmup for Tier 1 accounts

features.name: Podcast-Based Demand Generation
features.description: Launch and operationalize podcast for demand generation and thought leadership
scope: Integration with ABM (invite target accounts as guests)
features.notes: Podcast guests = ABM warmup. Invite logistics leaders from target accounts.

features.name: Small Roundtables
features.description: Intimate executive roundtables for relationship building and thought leadership
features.notes: Full Funnel Market Research Warmup technique - roundtables as research, then activation

features.name: Target Account Database & ABM Infrastructure
features.description: Canonical database of target accounts with scoring, enrichment, and tracking
features.notes: CRITICAL FOUNDATION. All other ABM campaigns depend on this. Jen Abel: Tier 1 logos ARE early adopters.

features.name: Move-as-One Discovery & Sales Process
features.description: Complete discovery-to-business-case sales methodology: discovery call → diagnostic → roadmapping → business case co-creation

1_discovery_call.name: Discovery Call
1_discovery_call.description: Structured discovery conversation to understand current state, pain points, and priorities

2_diagnostic.name: Diagnostic Assessment
2_diagnostic.description: Interactive diagnostic tool to assess maturity and identify value levers

3_roadmapping.name: Transformation Roadmap
3_roadmapping.description: Prioritized implementation roadmap based on diagnostic results

4_business_case.name: Business Case Co-Creation
4_business_case.description: Fluint-style 1-page business case prepared with champion

fluintIntegration.discoveryStages: Align discovery call to Fluint's 7 stages
fluintIntegration.businessCase: Use 1-page business case format from enabling-champions
fluintIntegration.championEnablement: Diagnostic outputs = champion's internal selling materials

features.notes: Core sales methodology. Diagnostic tool vibecoded in Next.js. Connects Fluint business case framework to automated diagnostic outputs.

features.name: AI-First SEO & Content Strategy
features.description: Full-funnel SEO and AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) strategy for organic discovery via Google and AI assistants

tofu.name: Top of Funnel (Awareness)
tofu.aeoFocus: Entity establishment, Q&A content for AI discovery

mofu.name: Middle of Funnel (Consideration)
mofu.aeoFocus: Comparison content, use case documentation for AI recommendations

bofu.name: Bottom of Funnel (Decision)
bofu.aeoFocus: JSON-LD schema, factual product statements for AI citation

features.notes: AI-sourced leads up 429% YoY. 12.7% of high-intent leads now come via AI discovery. Need both traditional SEO and AEO.

features.name: Lead & Account Nurturing Engine
features.description: Active nurturing to keep leads engaged and move engaged accounts into buying conversations

lead_nurture.name: Lead Nurturing
lead_nurture.description: Keep individual leads warm and engaged until ready to buy

account_nurture.name: Engaged Account Nurturing
account_nurture.description: Multi-threaded nurturing of accounts showing engagement signals
triggers: Multiple contacts from same account engaged
tactics: Sales handoff when buying signals appear

buying_conversation.name: Buying Conversation Activation
buying_conversation.description: Convert engaged accounts into active sales conversations

features.notes: Connects demand capture (F002) with ABM infrastructure (F006). Trust philosophy: nurture builds trust progressively until ask matches trust level.

features.name: ABM Warmup & Multi-Channel Outreach
features.description: Trust-first multi-channel warmup campaign: add value before asking anything. LinkedIn audience building + coordinated outreach across channels following trust ladder progression.

trustLadder.description: Every interaction must match the current trust level. Never ask more than you've earned.

antiPatterns: Pitch on connection request (Level 1 → Level 6 jump)
Demo request before any value given
Cold email asking for meeting with no context
Asking for referral before relationship exists

multiChannelOrchestration.coordinationPrinciple: Surround target accounts with consistent presence across channels, each touchpoint adding value

phase1_visibility.goal: Get on their radar without asking anything
linkedin: Like and comment on their posts (genuine insights)
Share content relevant to their industry
Engage in groups they're active in
email: First email: Industry insight, NO ASK
Second email: Benchmark data, still no ask

linkedin: Share specific resource based on engagement
email: Fourth email: Question about their approach

competitor_followers.name: Competitor Follower Capture
competitor_followers.description: Identify and connect with followers of competitor companies
tactics: Filter for ICP match (industry, role, geography)
Engage with their content BEFORE connecting
Targeted content to appear in their feed

influencer_followers.name: Influencer Audience Capture
influencer_followers.description: Connect with followers of relevant logistics/supply chain influencers

target_account_employees.name: Target Account Employee Connections
target_account_employees.description: Systematic connection building with employees at target accounts
approach: Map buying committee at Tier 1 accounts

valueDeliveryAssets.description: Content and resources to ADD VALUE at each trust level

scope: Trust ladder framework implementation in HubSpot
Content calendar aligned to warmup phases
features.notes: CRITICAL FEATURE. Trust-first approach differentiates us. Goal: earn the right to a conversation by adding value first. Every touchpoint must match trust level. This is the execution layer for Full Funnel ABM methodology.

features.name: Marketing MIS & Attribution Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive marketing reporting system with campaign KPIs, multi-touch attribution, and funnel tracking

campaign_performance.name: Campaign-wise Performance
campaign_performance.description: Weekly input and output KPIs per campaign

dual_level_funnel_tracking.name: Dual-Level Funnel Tracking
dual_level_funnel_tracking.description: Separate lifecycle tracking for Accounts AND Contacts with interplay rules

stages.definition: Account identified and added to target list

stages.criteria: Any contact engaged (content, website, email, LinkedIn)

stages.definition: Sales Accepted Lead - buying signals present
stages.criteria: Multiple contacts engaged OR executive engaged OR pricing page OR demo request
Contract signed or lost reason documented

interplayRules.description: How Contact and Account lifecycles interact

contactToAccountRules.trigger: Any contact from Target Account engages
contactToAccountRules.action: Move Account from 'Target Account' → 'Target Account Engaged'
Boost Account engagement score by 30 points

contactToAccountRules.trigger: N or N-1 level contact engages
contactToAccountRules.action: Move Account to 'Target Account - SAL' if engagement score > threshold
Account gets priority flag, alert sales
Move Account to 'Target Account - SAL', alert sales immediately

accountToContactRules.action: All engaged contacts move to 'Opportunity Contact'
All contacts move to 'Customer' lifecycle stage
Increase nurture priority for all contacts

hubspotAutomation.description: Automated workflows to maintain dual lifecycles
workflows: Contact engagement → Update account engagement score
Account score threshold → Change account lifecycle stage
Account stage change → Update associated contacts
Multi-contact detection → Alert and score boost
Weekly lifecycle stage sync and validation

scope: Data integration layer (HubSpot, Google Ads, LinkedIn, website)
features.notes: Single source of truth for marketing performance. Weekly review cadence. Essential for optimizing spend and proving ROI.

features.name: Partner Program - SAP System Integrators
features.description: MVE for partnerships with SAP System Integrators who implement SAP TM but need complementary TMS for mid-market
features.rationale: SAP SIs often encounter mid-market clients where SAP TM is overkill. Fretron can be their go-to recommendation.

phase1_identify: Research SAP SI landscape in India

forPartner: Offer alternative when SAP TM doesn't fit

features.notes: MVE approach: Start with 2-3 SIs, prove model, then scale. Focus on logistics/supply chain practice leads.

features.name: Partner Program - Business Consulting Firms
features.description: MVE for partnerships with management consulting and business advisory firms doing supply chain transformation
features.rationale: Consulting firms advise on supply chain strategy but need implementation partners. Fretron can be their recommended TMS.

phase1_identify: Find mutual connections for warm intro
phase2_outreach: Position as implementation partner for their recommendations
Provide case studies they can reference

forPartner: Implementation partner for their strategy work

features.notes: MVE approach: Target boutique/mid-tier consultancies first (easier access), then work up to MBB. Focus on supply chain transformation projects.

features.name: Partner Program - Cloud Providers
features.description: MVE for partnerships with hyperscaler cloud providers (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure) partner programs
features.rationale: Cloud providers have partner programs, marketplace listings, and co-sell motions that can drive enterprise deals.

phase2_activate: Get added to partner solution directories
phase3_cosell: Get co-sell referrals from cloud reps

forCloudPartner: Drive cloud consumption (Fretron runs on their cloud)
forFretron: Access to cloud sales team relationships

features.notes: MVE approach: Start with one cloud (likely AWS given India presence), prove model, expand. Marketplace listing is table stakes.

features.name: Paid Social & Retargeting Campaigns
features.description: LinkedIn paid ads (BoFU + ICP targeting) and multi-platform retargeting (LinkedIn, Meta, Google)

linkedin_bofu.name: LinkedIn Ads - BoFU Keywords
linkedin_bofu.description: Bottom-of-funnel LinkedIn ads targeting high-intent audiences
targeting: Job title targeting (VP Ops, Logistics Head, CFO)

linkedin_icp.name: LinkedIn Ads - ICP Targeting
linkedin_icp.description: Awareness and consideration ads targeting ideal customer profile
targeting: Job functions (Operations, Supply Chain, Logistics, Finance)
abmIntegration: Upload target account list for account-based targeting

linkedin_retargeting.name: LinkedIn Retargeting
linkedin_retargeting.description: Retarget website visitors and engaged contacts on LinkedIn
audiences: Website visitors (high-intent pages: pricing, demo, features)

meta_retargeting.name: Meta (Facebook/Instagram) Retargeting
meta_retargeting.description: Retarget website visitors on Facebook and Instagram
meta_retargeting.notes: B2B on Meta works for retargeting (they're already aware). Not for cold prospecting.

google_retargeting.name: Google Display & YouTube Retargeting
google_retargeting.description: Retarget across Google Display Network and YouTube

features.notes: Retargeting is highest ROI paid activity. LinkedIn for cold ICP prospecting, all platforms for retargeting warm audiences.

features.name: Programmatic SEO
features.description: Scalable, template-driven SEO pages targeting long-tail keywords programmatically
scope: Template design for each page type

technicalImplementation.approach: Next.js dynamic routes with static generation

uniqueness: Real customer quotes and case studies

features.notes: Programmatic SEO can 10x organic traffic. Key is unique data per page to avoid thin content penalties. Build on top of F008 (AI-First SEO strategy).

priorityDefinitions.high: Core to GTM success, do soon
